release.action: Changed wrong "V/A" in the code, which should be "N/A". This is the default shortLabel for the component
Added 1 new methods in CvObjectDAO allowing to search for a CV term by a single MI identifier.
Added 2 new methods in InteractorDAO allowing to count and retreive interactor involved in at least one Interaction.
In DaoFactory, check if the session is open when calling to getCurrentSession
StartupListener closing session factory on destroy. Added some synchronized methods to avoid exceptions in race conditions.
Fixed some issues with search, such as correct MatchModel for searches with percents.
Search Query Interface - Proper implementation for excluded terms.
QueryPhrase and QueryTerm are now Serializable.
SearchableCriteriaBuilder - When searching for AcOrId, just search on those primaryIds that are 'identity'
Component - The shortlabel of component can not be null, but is not set yet to anything so set it to V/A.
CvContext - fixed a class cast exception (r7287).

IntactSessionRequestFilter - Do not filter, when the url end with "lougout". In the Editor the logout just invalidate the http session, it does not need an hibernate session. And if the filter is on, it will try to commit all the transaction when the session is invalidated which produce an exception.
Intact Query Interface - some fixes (cf. r7273).
